title: Hair Pick
description:
A hair pick with a handle and several long teeth. Used to style hair, especially thick, curly hair. May be used as a symbol of Black culture or Black pride. 

May also be used to talk about grooming or self-care in general.

May be used metaphorically to refer to the verb comb, meaning "to carefully search."
apple_vendor_description: The hair pick emoji on Apple devices is rendered with a tactile appearance, featuring smooth, rounded prongs and a sturdy handle, all imbued with Appleâ€™s characteristic realistic lighting and subtle shading. Its clean lines and polished finish suggest both utility and style, representing the act of grooming, self-care, or a nod to cultural pride and personal expression. This emoji is a subtle yet impactful addition to Apple's diverse emoji collection.
